mapper.select: SELECT id, resume_id, title, company, job, content, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(modified) AS modified FROM letter WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM letter WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO letter (email, resume_id, title, company, job, content) VALUES (#{email}, #{resume_id}, #{title}, #{company}, #{job}, #{content, typeHandler=resumate.server.mybatis.LetterContentHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE letter SET title = #{title}, company = #{company}, job = #{job}, content = #{content, typeHandler=resumate.server.mybatis.LetterContentHandler}, modified = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
